LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematode.label: Mimic Nematode Parasitism
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematode.description: This colonist is infected with the Arachnae Mimic Nematode parasite. If not intervened, the nematode will eventually kill the host, transforming it into a mindless parasite. The nematode spreads the infection to other bodies through the host's aggressive behavior.
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematode.stages.0.label: dormant stage
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematode.stages.1.label: active stage
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematode.stages.2.label: terminal stage
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematode.stages.3.label: imminent change
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematodeShambler.label: Arachnae Mimic Nematode Parasite
LanguageData.ARA_MimicNematodeShambler.description: This corpse has been reanimated by the Arachnae Mimic Nematode parasite. The parasitized organism is sluggish, mindless, and attacks creatures indiscriminately. After a few days of activity, the parasite dies due to the host's declining metabolism. If captured and immobilized, the parasite cannot move and its life activities cease.
LanguageData.ARA_Rising.label: Rising
LanguageData.ARA_Rising.description: The powerful regenerative ability from the Arachnae Mimic Nematode parasite is resurrecting this body.
This body has just been "resurrected" by the Arachnae Mimic Nematode parasite.
